subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Canada produced the most lopsided win so far at the world championships in Zurich, defeating Hungary, 9-0, on Sunday. Martin St. Louis had three goals and Shea Weber added two for Canada, which scored four times in the first 13 minutes.
